entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
